name: Exapark Cloud Easy Access
short_description: Exapark Cloud Easy Access is a freeware application based on Eclipse RCP which makes easier work with amazon instances group. Exapark Cloud Easy Access provide control panel with list of instances with status information.You can see all instances which are available under all specified accounts and can run start/stop commands. In addition our application provides comfortable approach to connect to selected instance via standard or some your favorite SSH or RDP client.
